name: Intro
_source: speak;Sages;Please, we need your aid, kind Sir.
speak;Dean;Those robes... Arcei?|Prince Sages? An honour-
speak;Sal;I know this is hasty, but we need somewhere to shelter our friend.
speak;Dean;We're already targetted by Monsdor, this won't help.
speak;Sages;Monsdor is still after you? Villains...
speak;Dean;Though seeing you here, so dishevelled...|Hardly villains.|Though, my heartstrings aren't really enough to get aid.
speak;Sal;Please, sir...|Zio wanted to support us, but...|We haven't seen her around.
speak;Leap;He's in kahoots with some weird people...|The monsters, he was involved, I'm sure!
speak;Sages;We've also dealt with monsters, and Monsdor.
speak;Prof;Prince Sages, we have a common foe.
speak;Leap;He also locked us in a cell, until his son...
speak;Dean;He locked you away...?|Nobody does that to my son, or you too, Leap.
speak;Snow;The King of Monsdor wants to take his Majesty to Aurelia, it seems.|Likely for an execution.
speak;Dean;A pact between Monsdor and Aurelia...
speak;Sages;It seems Grahment is collateral to get to us.|For Monsdor to display their strength, so Aurelia respects them.
speak;Leap;We're just some kind of spectacle?!|Our people have suffered, given their lives up!
speak;Leap;Oh, that's it!|Monsdor needs to learn a lesson!
speak;Snow;Though his Majesty will be unsafe in Aurelia, given his health.|Execution or not, he may not have long left...|You haven't got enough time to waste with Monsdor.
speak;Dean;We'll need to divide our forces.
speak;Sages;I know this is a lot to ask, but can you handle Monsdor?
speak;Leap;Oh, trust me, I sure will try!
speak;Prof;We're not quite that capable though... being realistic.
speak;Dean;I suggest the Khonsu desert.|Some of the tribes might offer help if you prove your might.
speak;Sal;Sounds like a plan, but how will we reach Aurelia quickly...?
speak;Dean;We have several docks to the north-east.|I think you'll be able to seek passage.
speak;Dean;Dean Essar, at your service.|This is my son and his partner, Leap.
speak;Sages;I, as you folk know, am Prince Sages of Arcei!
speak;Snow;I am his Majesty's apothecary, Snow.|Do you mind if I stay here to treat General Javi?
speak;Dean;Take all the time you need.
speak;Leap;It's so nice to meet you all!|But, I'm sorry we have to part so soon...
speak;Sages;My good fellows, the game is afoot!
speak;Blazing;Lord Sages, if I might have a moment?
speak;Blazing;Well, I appreciate working with your squad, truly.|However, I believe it'd be best for me to fight alongside our Grahment acquaintances here.
speak;Sages;Makes sense, Leap, you wanna take him?
speak;Leap;Sure! We need all the help we can!
speak;Blazing;Thank you for your understanding...|Take care on your trip, Lord Sages.
